Package pkgController

Class CarouselController

java.lang.Object
pkgController.CarouselController
Direct Known Subclasses:
DragDropCarouselController, InfoCarouselController, SelectCarouselController
public abstract class CarouselController
extends java.lang.Object
Author:
Zane Greenholt Abstract class that contains the basic functionality for a controller for a carousel. These functions include handlers for clicking the left and right buttons.

    • clickedPopup

      public void clickedPopup​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Handler that is used for when an image is clicked in the info carousel. It opens a popup with information about the plant that matches the clicked image.
      Parameters:
      event - A MouseEvent that is the mouse being pressed
